alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:02PM CDT until July 24 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI...CENTRAL ALEXANDER AND NORTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mounds, or 10 miles north of Cairo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mounds, Tamms, Olive Branch, Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Pulaski and Commerce. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 6 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
